ow.routing
インタフェース CallbackOnRoute

public interface CallbackOnRoute

メソッドの概要
 java.io.Serializable process(ID target, int tag, java.io.Serializable[] callbackArgs, CallbackResultFilter filter, IDAddressPair lastHop, boolean onRootNode)
          A callback method, which is called by a routing driver on each hop in a route.
 

メソッドの詳細

process

java.io.Serializable process(ID target,
                             int tag,
                             java.io.Serializable[] callbackArgs,
                             CallbackResultFilter filter,
                             IDAddressPair lastHop,
                             boolean onRootNode)
A callback method, which is called by a routing driver on each hop in a route.

パラメータ:
target - destination of the routing.
tag - tag given by the initiator of the routing.
callbackArgs - arguments given by the initiator of the routing.
filter - filter which processes the result returned by a callback.
lastHop - the last hop of this node. possibly null.
onRootNode - true if this node is the root node.
戻り値:
the result on the root node is passed to the initiator.
